A road segment in Lisbon, Portugal

Source: R/data.R
lisbon_road_segment.Rd

A single road segment and a 3d version.

lisbon_road_segment

Format

An object of class sf

Source

Produced by ESRI's 3D Analyst extension

Examples

lisbon_road_segment
#> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 21 fields
#> Active geometry column: geom
#> geometry type:  LINESTRING
#> dimension:      XY

#> CRS:            ETRS89 / Portugal TM06

#> 1     2997  2997     0.0780       182.  86.5  92.3   89.9    183.     0.334

#> #   [m]>, geom <LINESTRING [m]>
